mapper.select: select z.zzim_no, z.mem_id, t.ttr_no, m.mem_id, t.ttr_title, z.zzim_date from zzim z, theater t, member m where m.mem_id = z.mem_id and t.ttr_no = z.ttr_no and z.mem_id = #{mem_id} order by z.zzim_no
mapper.update: insert into zzim(zzim_no, mem_id, ttr_no) values(zzim_seq.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{ttr_no})
